title: How is a cellphone important in daily life? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you require telecommunication, mobile telephony and/or information daily, then cell phone is a requirement today. The technology is here for people to use without heavy cost for the users (compared to the heavy cost to develop the mobile telecommunication services). But to people who do not require those, cell phone is not important at all, i.e., tribes in Amazon and some secluded places on earth.
